---
name: Feature request
about: Suggest an idea that improves the project
labels: enhancement
---

## Summary
Describe the feature you would like to see.

## Problem / Motivation
Why is this feature important? What problem does it solve for admins or users?

## Proposed solution
Share any implementation ideas, alternative approaches, or reference projects.

## Acceptance criteria
List the requirements that must be satisfied for this feature to be considered complete.

## Additional context
Add any other information, mockups, or notes that would help scope the work.
